GPUUncapturedErrorEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The GPUUncapturedErrorEvent interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} is the event object type for the event, used for telemetry and to report unexpected errors.

remarks.para: Known error cases should be handled using and .

-The WebGPU API
-WebGPU Error Handling best practices
